file.name: common_path_parameter_in_components.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Todo List
paths:
  /todos/{id}:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/todoIdParam"
    get:
      description: 'Get all todos'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
    post:
      description: 'Create a new todo.'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
    delete:
      description: 'Delete a todo entry.'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
components:
  parameters:
    todoIdParam:
      name: id
      in: path
      required: true
      description: "Identifier of a specific todo entry."
      schema:
        type: integer
        format: int32
